about_the_game:
Ether @ Net: Unveil the Hidden Truths Behind the Supernatural
Dive into the dark and mysterious world of Ether @ Net, a unique first-person horror puzzle game set against the backdrop of Hong Kong's dense urban environment. You play as Alex, a skilled internet technician tasked with investigating an unusual network outage in a haunted apartment building. As you unravel the secrets behind the disconnection, you'll find yourself entangled in the spectral mysteries that lurk within the city's most haunted locations.

Key Features

Supernatural Mysteries: Uncover hidden truths as you explore eerie, haunted apartments and interact with ghostly entities that blur the lines between the digital and spiritual worlds.

Challenging Puzzles: Use your technical skills to repair malfunctioning networks and solve intricate puzzles that blend technology with the supernatural. Each challenge brings you closer to uncovering the dark secrets of the haunted apartments.



Immersive Environments: Navigate through meticulously designed locations, from decrepit urban housing blocks to modern high-tech apartments. Every environment is rich with history and atmosphere, enhancing the chilling narrative.

Engaging Storyline: Team up with spectral guides and troubled souls as you delve deeper into the mystery. The game’s narrative intertwines the terror of modern technology with the traditional horror of urban legends, creating a story that’s both contemporary and timeless.



Atmospheric Sound Design: Experience the eerie ambiance brought to life through immersive soundscapes, from the creaking of old floorboards to the unsettling whispers of the undead. The sound design amplifies the tension and immerses you fully in the horror experience.

Multiple Endings: Your decisions and actions will determine the outcome of the game, with multiple endings that reflect the choices you made throughout your journey.

Prepare Yourself For An Unforgettable Journey

In Ether @ Net, every corner you turn and every puzzle you solve brings you closer to understanding the sinister forces at play. Can you repair the network, uncover the truth, and help the restless spirits find peace? Or will you succumb to the malevolent entities that haunt the city? The fate of the living and the dead rests in your hands.

Release Date: Q1 2026

Developer/Publisher: Studio Molo

name: Ether@Net

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Unravel the supernatural mysteries in Ether @ Net! As a internet technician, explore a Hong Kong haunted apartments, face otherworldly forces, and team up with a spiritual guide and haunted couple. An exciting blend of mystery and adventure awaits in this thrilling game!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
